{{cpp/string/char_traits/title|to_int_type}}
{{cpp/string/char_traits/navbar}}
{{ddcl|notes={{mark constexpr since c++11}}&lt;br&gt;{{mark noexcept since c++11}}|
static int_type to_int_type( char_type c );
}}

Converts {{c|c}} to {{tt|int_type}}.

See {{named req|CharTraits}} for the general requirements on character traits for {{tt|X::to_int_type}}.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|c|value to convert}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
A value equivalent to {{c|c}}.

===Complexity===
Constant.

===Notes===
For every valid value of {{tt|char_type}}, there must be a unique value of {{tt|int_type}} distinct from {{lc|eof()}}.
